Make The Most Of Belfast City Centre With The Best Gyms, Shops, Bars, Restaurants Just Around The Corner

Located In The Culture Hub Of Belfast With St.Annes Square, The Mac And The Black Box Just Minutes Away

Transport

A 10 minute drive from George Best Airport. Belfast International Airport is a comfortable 30 minute drive away.

Short taxi ride (or ten minute walk) to Central and Great Victoria Street Transport Hub.

Linked to UK National Cycle Network. Belfast Bike Share Scheme Docking Station one minute away.

Close to Belfast Harbour, with multiple daily sailings coming and going from other major U.K cities.

Work & play In Cathedral Quarter Belfast
